Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

"I have a bad feeling about it" said Ocipite.

"Come on, Ocipite" said annoyed Aelo"Don't say it more!!!"

"Why lately are arguing among us?" said Celeno "We never have done 
before..."

"'cause your nervous sister are afraid to explore an old ship... " 
said Aelo while she walked  some steps towards the room where the 
alliance's bot were, she turned her body and looking to her sisters 
Aelo said "You see... nobody is here... It's very quiet"

"Yea... very quiet... it chills my back " replied Ocipite.

"Of course" said Aelo while she turned her body  and walked some 
steps to the room "Now you will said that someone was hidden here 
with a powerful weapon and he will start firing against us... 
Ocipite, you should better no read Stephen King's and that sort of 
novels, those things are making you imagining things...!!"
